allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "security: update torch to 2.8.0 to address CVE vulnerabilities" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
Updates PyTorch to version 2.8.0 across all Python dependencies to address security vulnerabilities.

## Security Issues Addressed
- **HIGH**: Minerva timing attack on P-256 in python-ecdsa (Dependabot alert #1380)
- Related torch security vulnerabilities in older versions

## Changes
**server/requirements.txt:**
- torch: 2.1.0 â†’ 2.8.0
- torchvision: 0.16.0 â†’ 0.19.0
- torchaudio: 2.1.0 â†’ 2.5.0

**apps/ml-engine/src/python/requirements.txt:**
- torch: 2.0.1 â†’ 2.8.0

## Test Plan
- [ ] Verify Python dependencies install correctly
- [ ] Run ML engine tests
- [ ] Verify CV/OCR functionality still works
- [ ] Check Dependabot alerts are resolved

## References
- Dependabot alert #1380
- PyTorch 2.8.0 release notes

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)" --base main)
